explanation: Sentiment is mixed but leans bullish after BTC held 106500 and quickly recovered, with many participants discussing buys, holding, and expectations of higher prices (e.g., 'BTC  dont miss it', 'Nice time to buy some BTC'). Some warn of dumps and resistance at 108k, but several users are looking for long opportunities and a few anticipate a new all-time high. Recent candlestick action (bounce off 107200/106500) and market absorption discussion support a short-term buy outlook, but with caution around resistance and liquidation zones.
